subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The bell will ring at Torrey Pines on Thursday at 8:06 a.m., when Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson, along with Adam Scott, who is No. 3 in the world, tee off on the first hole.
snippet: The bell will ring at Torrey Pines on Thursday at 8:06 a.m., when Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson, along with Adam Scott, who is No. 3 in the world, tee off on the first hole.
